title: How to unsubscribe from Skvot
description: You can cancel your Skvot subscription through the Google Play Store, Apple App Store, or directly through the Skvot website, depending on where you originally subscribed.

web.title: Cancel Subscription via Skvot Website
web.description:
To cancel your Skvot subscription via the website:

*   Go to the Skvot website.
*   Log in to your account.
*   Navigate to the settings menu, usually found by clicking on your avatar.
*   Click on "Manage Subscription" within the billing and subscription settings.
*   Click the "Cancel subscription" option.
*   Confirm your cancellation.

google_play.title: Cancel Subscription via Google Play Store
google_play.description:
To cancel your Skvot subscription via the Google Play Store:

*   Open the Google Play Store.
*   Tap your profile icon in the top right corner.
*   Go to "Payments & subscriptions" and then select "Subscriptions".
*   Choose the Skvot subscription you want to cancel.
*   Tap "Cancel subscription".
*   Follow any on-screen instructions to confirm the cancellation.

ios.title: Cancel Subscription via iOS Settings
ios.description:
To cancel your Skvot subscription via iOS Settings:

*   Open the Settings app.
*   Tap your name.
*   Tap "Subscriptions".
*   Tap the Skvot subscription you wish to cancel.
*   Tap "Cancel Subscription".

seo_text: Cancel Skvot subscription, Skvot cancellation guide, unsubscribe from Skvot, end Skvot membership, Skvot billing, stop Skvot payments
